casebody.data:
ARMSTRONG
v.
NORTH CAROLINA, et al. 39P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2017 Arthur O. Armstrong, Los Angeles, CA, for Armstrong, Arthur O. The following order has been entered on the motions filed by Plaintiff for Leave to File a Writ of Mandamus: "All Motions Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2017." Ervin, J. recused
